attributes.action: Save cyclists lives: Force fit of HGV blind-spot mirrors now!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Join Cycling Plus magazine in calling for recommended EU legislation on HGV blind spot mirrors to be brought in now and save an estimated 18 cyclists a year (DfT's own figures!). Don't let the government fritter away time and lives until the March 2009 deadline. Vote to fit them now and make our city streets safer to cycle.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Save cyclists lives: Force fit of HGV blind-spot mirrors now!"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
